channel.title: CVE Feed for CrushFTP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CrushFTP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4040|2024-08-01T20:26:57.283Z -- crushftp -- crushftp
item.description: A server side template injection vulnerability in CrushFTP in all versions before 10.7.1 and 11.1.0 on all platforms allows unauthenticated remote attackers to read files from the filesystem outside of the VFS Sandbox, bypass authentication to gain administrative access, and perform remote code execution on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-4040|2024-06-04T17:56:36.470Z -- crushftp -- crushftp
item.description: A server side template injection vulnerability in CrushFTP in all versions before 10.7.1 and 11.1.0 on all platforms allows unauthenticated remote attackers to read files from the filesystem outside of the VFS Sandbox, bypass authentication to gain administrative access, and perform remote code execution on the server.
